app.name: SwarmShift Enterprise
app.tagline: Create and deploy easily AI Agents

auth.switchToLogin: Already have an account? Sign in

dashboard.agentCount: You have {count} AI agents ready to help you find information.
dashboard.noAgentsDesc: Create your first AI agent to start building intelligent document assistants.

createAgent.title: Create New AI Agent
createAgent.subtitle: Build an intelligent assistant from your documents
createAgent.basicInfoDesc: Give your AI agent a name and description to help identify it later.
createAgent.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this agent will help with...
createAgent.modelConfigDesc: Configure the AI models and processing methods for your agent.
createAgent.embeddingModelHelp: The model used to convert documents into searchable vectors. OpenAI provides high-quality embeddings for most use cases.
createAgent.llmModelHelp: The AI model that will understand and respond to user queries. GPT-3.5-turbo offers a good balance of performance and cost.
createAgent.splittingMethodHelp: How documents are broken into chunks. Recursive splitting preserves context better, while character splitting creates uniform chunks.
createAgent.dataSourcesDesc: Upload documents or provide URLs to build your knowledge base.
createAgent.clickToBrowse: or click to browse and select files

agentConfig.title: Agent Configuration
agentConfig.subtitle: Modify settings and documents for your AI agent
agentConfig.documentManagementDesc: Add or remove documents from your agent's knowledge base.

chat.title: Chat with your RAG
chat.askQuestion: Ask a question about your documents...
chat.askQuestionHelp: Ask questions about your uploaded documents. The AI will search and provide relevant answers.
chat.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm your RAG assistant. I can help you find information from your uploaded documents. What would you like to know?
chat.simulatedResponse:
Based on your documents, here's what I found:

This is a simulated response that would normally be generated by analyzing your uploaded documents using RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation). The system would search through your knowledge base and provide contextually relevant answers.
